name: Soul Harvest (itch) (OminusGalaxy44)
description:
(DOWNLOAD FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE + LESS INPUT LAG) (USE PASSTHROUGH TO JUMP OUT IF YOU GET TRAPPED IN PLATFORMS)

As the new Grim Reaper, it's terrible when you miss your shift. Especially when it traps souls in the realm of the living!

In this game, you must harvest humans' souls to gain enough life force to remain in the realm of the living.

Harvest by swinging and controlling your scythe, as well as launching orbs of dark energy.

Use your abilities as a Grim Reaper to free the 5 groups of souls that were trapped here due to your error!

Tip: The phase through ability is extremely useful and sometimes necessary for platforming
